official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "Spouse".

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to redefine the term "spouse" by excluding requirements that the spouse be a member of the annuitants household or receiving or contributing to the support of such wife or husband.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "Spouse".
